name: recordedfuture
description: This App implements actions to retrieve data from Recorded Future for event analysis.

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
Look up an alert rule ID using the pre-configured rule's name.

actions.description: Look up alert data using a rule ID and a specified time frame for when the alert(s) triggered for that rule.

rule_id.description: Rule ID to look up alert data for

timeframe.description: Timeframe for when rules were triggered

vulnerability.description: CVE vulnerability identifier to look up
